name: mega-glove
effect: Unused.  This is Korrina's Key Stone in X and Y, but it cannot be obtained by the player.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
This glove contains an untold power that somehow
enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to
Mega Evolve in battle.

enables Pokémon carrying Mega Stones to
